content: {"name": "New York City Family Justice Centers (FJCs) - Manhattan", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Must first undergo screening/interview by phone (15-20 mins).\nHelps with domestic violence/ intimate relationships violence with case management, safety planning, seeking housing and legal assistance, etc.", "email": "", "url": "http://www.nyc.gov/html/ocdv/downloads/pdf/Materials_FJC_OnePage_English.pdf", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "80 Centre St", "address_2": null, "city": "New York", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "10013", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.7153545, "longitude": -74.00166879999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(212) 602-2800", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "22:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "22:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "22:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "22:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "22:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}]}
